pages.text: Artifacts are the fragments of civilization of the Vault, which are also great puzzle for all Vault Hunters.$(br2)The final goal of all Vault Hunters is to collect $(l)25$() unique Artifacts, complete the Artifact Puzzle, and finally challenge and overcome the Herald. $(br2)达到20级之后，当你$(l)完成宝库$()时，$(l)Unidentified Artifact$()会有5%的概率出现在complete crates中。当你达到$(l)50级以上$()时，这个概率会提升至20%。

pages.title: Artifact Tome
pages.text: $(br)Artifact Tome is a mysterious tome of Artifact puzzle. Vault Hunters can depend on it to complete the Artifact puzzle. $(l)Put the Artifact Tome onto the world，其上方会显示5x5的Artifact谜题，将Artifact放置在其$(l)对应位置$()，再右击Artifact Tome即可完成谜题。

pages.title: 终极POG
pages.text: $(br)你需要收集全部25种Artifacts，而鉴定Artifact时可能出现重复的Artifact。$(br2)你可以将重复的Artifact与$(l)Omega POG$()在铁砧中组合，将其重置为新的Unidentified Artifact。

pages.title: Seal of Herald
pages.text: $(br)完成谜题可以获得$(l)Seal of Herald$()，这是挑战宝库的final boss, $(l)Herald$()的钥匙。$(br2)Seal of Herald可以通过Artifact Tome$(l)无限$()获取。Herald Vault的挑战方法详见$(l:the_vault/objectives#herald)$(l)战胜先驱者$()。
